attributes.action: Make it law that  Local Councils must work for the people, not the other way round.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Local Councils now expect the ratepayers to work harder to pay the ever increasing costs of Council Expenditure. Most of this is of no benefit to the Local People. i.e. pensions for the councillers, foreign fact finding trips, persecuting locals with rubbish & parking police. The Councils should stick to Schools, Rubbish collections (weekly)and should comprise of local people from the area.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
